select rnum,app.app_no,app.app_title,app.app_summery,app.app_place, app.app_regdate,app.start_date,app.end_date,app.goal_mileage,app.app_status from (select row_number() over(order by app_no desc) rnum,app_no,app_title, app_summery,app_place,to_char(app_regdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') app_regdate, to_char(start_date,'yyyy.mm.dd') start_date, to_char(end_date,'yyyy.mm.dd') end_date,goal_mileage,app_status,id from application) app, gt_member m where app.id=m.id and rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber} order by app.app_no desc
